name: nodehttpd
description: * nodehttpd ** About This is a simple httpd server written in NodeJS for the purposes of learning Javascript language using functional programming principles without any additional libraries. ** How to run 1. Clone the repo. 2. ~cd nodehttpd && npm run run~ 3. Open at [[http://localhost:3000][http://localhost:3000]] with curl or a web browser. ** License MIT License
